full_summary:
[Foreword]
**Remotely Operated Vehicle (ROV) Tender Notice**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested bidders to participate in a Request for Proposal for the supply and delivery of a Remotely Operated Vehicle (ROV). The end-user of this equipment is the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) in St. John’s, NL.

**Key Information**

| Category | Details |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Reference Number | WS3819221920 |
| RP Reference Number | WS3819221920-Doc3819426488 |
| Tender Closing Date | January 25, 2023, 02:00pm EST |
| Solicitation Number | WS3819221920 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | February 1, 2023 |

**Description**

The DFO, based in St. John’s, NL, requires the supply and delivery of one (1) DeepTrekker Revolution NAV Remotely Operated Vehicle (ROV), along with related sampling accessories or equivalent. The ROV will be used for various purposes, including research and debris collection.

**Pre-Qualification and Bidding**

To participate in this tender, bidders must submit their Request for Proposal (RFP) package, which must include all the necessary supporting documentation, to the PSPC no later than January 25, 2023 at 02:00pm EST. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Additional Information**

* The expected contract end date is unknown.
* The procurement method is competitive and open for bidding.
* The selection criteria for this tender will be based on the lowest price.
* The trade agreements eligible for this tender include the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and others.
* The regions of delivery include St. John’s, NL.
* Contact information and additional details can be found at the notice URL: [insert URL].

Please note that a formal Invitation to Bid (ITB) will be issued in the near future, as the solicitation number has not yet been closed. For more information, or to submit a bid, kindly refer to the provided notice URL above. Your Corporation will appreciate a prompt response to this tender announcement.  \\[ Mention company name]". 

Note: The SFW Reference for this Notice changed from a Accommodating DP facilitated For Annex from:WS –Business corresponplace date97 Bed restoration-rock Cover
